attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because I’m a huge Trump supporter and my phone immediately started glitching out after the app downloaded! I WOULDNT GET this app unless you want glitches on your phone. You would think Trump being a successful businessman would have a better app! Plus the app asks you a lot of information about where you live and what you do! Talk about a security concern! Definitely a waste of my time! 
1/5
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I got this app in hopes of purifying my liberal actions. Actually caring about other people got so exhausting, so I decided I would try joining trumps cult of idiots who have worms for brains. The app took 69 hours to download (which I spent trying to manifest my brain to turn into worms for the full experience.) I was expecting to instantly become a white supremacist but I’m still an educated atheist liberal....disappointing! Don’t download this app
attributes.title: Shawdy like a melody in my head

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of better understanding the president. Instead all I found was disturbing images of a rotten Cheeto screaming propaganda. I felt a sharp pain fill my stomach, I was rushed to the emergency room only to be diagnosed with stage ten liver cancer. I’ve been given 10 minutes to live and I’m using it to write this review, do not install this app or vote for trump. He is toxic and disgusting. Now if you’ll excuse me I am going to pass away.
attributes.title: This app gave me cancer

attributes.review: WOW. I got the Trump 2020 app to stay informed but the first red flag about this app is that it took 2 DAYS to download It took up so much storage on my phone that I had to delete half of my apps and when I actually went to open the app a bunch of ads popped up and then trumps voice started violently screaming. “Trump 2020!, Trump 2020! Trump 2020!” And even when I closed the app I still kept playing at it eventually busted the speakers on my phone! Unbelievable!!!!!!! DONT GET THIS APP!!
attributes.title: VERY DISSAPOINTED!

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app in the hopes of getting so lovely trump apparel, when it started to glitch my phone out. I though nothing of it which was the biggest mistake. First, it was the glitching of my phone, then the horrid fairy emojis flooded my phone. Endless notifications harassing me every minute. I had to get rid of my phone and I blame this stupid app. Please I beg that no one make the same mistake as I did.
attributes.title: Ugh do not download will ruin your life

attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what Trump had in store for the new election. The news is filled with stories on COVID19. It worked fine for a couple of days but then it started glitching. I thought it was just my phone so I powered it off and tried again. It didn’t work. Then I deleted and reinstalled the app. It has been glitching and freezing constantly. I really hope you can fix this. 🇺🇸
attributes.title: glitchy

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i thought it was going to be nice and all but as i soon as i opened the app i was greeted by a cheeto?! 🙀 i immediately went to the toilet to throw up because of what i just saw. then all of a sudden i heard a knock on my door. who could it be you ask? BERNIE SANDERS! i was so grateful to see him after what i had just saw. we talked about how good of a president he would be and how bad trump is and why he shouldn’t be president!!! 😗
attributes.title: #settleforbiden

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and it really messed up my phone. Waste of time. Literally why is this dude making an app instead of doing something about the coronavirus. Is this what he was doing in that bunker🙄😳. Also don’t delete tiktok thanks luv❤️🥰. Also stop using the same excuse and blaming Russia or China saying there “stealing” our info. Like what are they gonna do??? Anyways when’s the funeral, can I be invited?🥳😮-some cute white blonde chick (I’m black btw)🇳🇬🧚🏾
attributes.title: Yikes

attributes.review: im wish i could rate this app a 0 but unfortunately i cannot but it kept crashing and it showed his nudes 😨 my wallpaper changed to trump 2020 all of a sudden 😠without me touching nothing i think y’all should take down this app my phone now has a biggg virus my keeps showing 🍊donald🍊nudes i was very very disappointed 😞 i now have to take therapy because of this i DO NOT recommend getting the app unless u want similar experiences!
attributes.title: eww 😍

attributes.review: This app took way too long to download it took over 3 days to download!!! Like why does it need to take so long!! And why did it send me a weird text after I got the text my phone started glitching and I have the new iPhone 11 max pro! I do not recommend getting this app as soon as I deleted it my phone started working normally. Do not get this app if you don’t want your phone bugging out!
attributes.title: This app is horrible!!
